short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically record visits to PDF URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Name: PDF Auto Recorder

Description:
Easily record and manage your visited PDF URLs with PDF Auto Recorder. This lightweight Chrome extension automatically captures URLs of PDF files you open, providing a convenient way to keep track of your digital documents.

Key Features:
Automatic Recording: The extension seamlessly records PDF URLs as you access them.
Clean and Simple UI: A user-friendly interface allows you to view and manage your recorded PDFs effortlessly.
Title Extraction: PDF titles are extracted when available, enhancing the clarity of your records.

How to Use:
Simply install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open any PDF file in your browser.
The extension will automatically record the PDF URL.

Benefits:
Effortless Organization: Keep a record of PDFs you've viewed without manual input.
Quick Access: Access your recorded PDFs with a single click.
Clean and Intuitive Design: A minimalistic design ensures a hassle-free experience.
Privacy and Security:
PDF Auto Recorder respects your privacy. It only captures PDF URLs and does not store any personal information.

Get Started:
Enhance your browsing experience and effortlessly manage your PDFs. Install PDF Auto Recorder today!
